title: Self-Directed Instructional Design for Improving Basic Mathematical Concepts in [Large-Scale]

context.additional_context: Customized instructional design for professional adult learners to systematically acquire language-integrated numeracy concepts.

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least 80% proficiency in solving daily problems using the principles of number partitioning and combination within three months.
Learners can produce visualizations of numerical relationships using digital tools with 90% accuracy.
Learners improve their ability to verbally explain mathematical thinking processes through project-based assessments by at least 75%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
